title: IMP-8 MIT Plasma Investigation, High Resolution Definitive Data   - A. Lazarus (MIT)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/imp/imp8/plasma_mit/mitplasma_h0/1973/i8_h0_mitplasma_19731031_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 28000 [ms] = PT28S, occurred for 13.8889% of the 5 timesteps.

parameters.name: Spacecraft
parameters.description: Spacecraft flag (6/7/8 =IMP 6/7/8)

parameters.name: decimal_year
parameters.description: Decimal Year

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: Region flag (1=Solar Wind, 2= Solar Wind or Magnetosheath, 3= Not Solar Wind)

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operating mode flag [1:Non-tracking (NTMS), 2:Tracking (TMS), 3:Acquisition (AQM)]

parameters.name: xyzgse
parameters.description: IMP8 Position, Cartesian-GSE - orbit plot

parameters.name: xyzgse_t
parameters.description: IMP8 Position, Cartesian-GSE - time series plots X/Y/Z. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['xyzgse']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: ygsm
parameters.description: IMP8 position, Y-component, GSM

parameters.name: zgsm
parameters.description: IMP8 position, Z-component, GSM

parameters.name: V_fit
parameters.description: (Fits-based, no region selected) Proton Flow Speed

parameters.name: V_fit_rfilt
parameters.description: --> (Fits-based, solar wind only) Proton Flow Speed. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function region_filt (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['V_fit', 'Region']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
